source_sentence: 日本國承和五年入唐求法目錄
translation: Catalogue of Buddhist Practices Admitted to the Tang in the Fifth Year of the Japanese Empire

source_sentence: 經疏章傳等一百三十漆部二百一卷。
translation: There are 130 commentaries, chapters, records, and so forth, and 121 volumes.

source_sentence: 曼荼羅并印契壇樣諸聖者影及舍利等。
translation: The maṇḍala, the seals, the altar patterns, the images of the sages, the relics, and so forth.

source_sentence: 大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢大乘經一卷一切佛心中心經一卷寶星經略述二十八宿佉盧瑟吒仙人經一卷陀羅尼集要經一卷蘇摩呼童子請經一卷新譯般若心經一卷(般若三藏譯)阿利多軍荼利護國大自在拔折羅摩訶布陀羅金神力陀羅尼一卷(阿地多日照三藏翻本)金剛頂蓮華部心念誦儀軌二卷觀自在菩薩如意輪念誦儀軌一卷(大興善寺不空譯)已上九部一十卷同帙。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Immaculate Conception of the Twelve Mudras of the Great Auspicious Goddess, one volume of the Sutra of the Center of the Essence of All Buddhas, one volume of the Jewel Star Sutra, one volume of the Dhāraṇī Collection Essentials, one volume of the Sumāhuja Invocation Sutra, one volume of the New Translation of the Heart Sutra, one volume of the Golden Force Dhāraṇī of Ariṣṭa's Army, one volume of the Ariṣṭa Sunshine Tripiṭaka, one volume of the Ritual Procedure for Recitation to the Lotus School, two volumes of the Ritual Procedure for Recitation to the Bodhisattva Spontaneous Force, one volume of the Bhūtaka Translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Wish Wheel, one volume of the Daxingshanji Temple, and the above nine divisions and ten volumes in the same volume.

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在菩薩修行儀軌一卷普賢菩薩金剛薩埵瑜伽念誦儀軌一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)金剛頂瑜伽金剛薩埵五祕密修行念誦儀軌一卷金剛頂勝初瑜伽經中略出大樂金剛薩埵念誦儀軌一卷觀自在如意輪菩薩瑜伽法要一卷(金剛智譯)如意輪菩薩真言注義一卷金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在菩薩念誦法一卷葉衣觀自在菩薩法一卷大佛頂諸菩薩萬行品灌頂部錄出中印契別行法門一卷阿閦如來念誦供養法一卷(不空金剛譯)已上一十部一十卷同帙。
translation: 金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在菩薩修行儀軌一卷普賢菩薩金剛薩埵瑜伽念誦儀軌一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)金剛頂瑜伽金剛薩埵五祕密修行念誦儀軌一卷金剛頂勝初瑜伽經中略出大樂金剛薩埵念誦儀軌一卷觀自在如意輪菩薩瑜伽法要一卷(金剛智譯)如意輪菩薩真言注義一卷金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在菩薩念誦法一卷葉衣觀自在菩薩法一卷大佛頂諸菩薩萬行品灌頂部錄出中印契別行法門一卷阿閦如來念誦供養法一卷(不空金剛譯)已上一十部一十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 修真言三昧四時禮懺供養儀要一卷
translation: Essentials of the Rituals for Making Offerings During the Four Times of Worship and Repentance in the Cultivation of the True Language Samādhi One Fascicle

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽十八會指歸一卷(大興善寺不空譯)佛頂尊勝陀羅尼注義一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)最上乘教授戒懺悔文一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)太元阿吒薄句無邊甘露降伏一切鬼神真言一卷火壇供養及供養十天法一卷施燋面一切餓鬼食陀羅尼法一卷大樂金剛不空真實三昧耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣釋一卷已上八部八卷同帙。
translation: 金剛頂瑜伽十八會指歸一卷(大興善寺不空譯)佛頂尊勝陀羅尼注義一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)最上乘教授戒懺悔文一卷(大興善寺沙門不空譯)太元阿吒薄句無邊甘露降伏一切鬼神真言一卷火壇供養及供養十天法一卷施燋面一切餓鬼食陀羅尼法一卷大樂金剛不空真實三昧耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣釋一卷已上八部八卷同帙。

source_sentence: 梵漢兩字大毘盧舍那經字輪品悉曇一卷梵漢兩字金剛般若經二卷梵漢兩字阿彌陀經一卷梵漢兩字般若心經一卷梵漢兩字最勝無垢清淨光明大陀羅尼一卷梵漢兩字不空羂索真言一卷梵漢兩字青□大悲真言一卷梵漢兩字一切佛心真言一卷梵漢兩字一切佛心中心真言一卷梵漢兩字灌頂心中心真言一卷梵漢兩字結界真言一卷梵漢兩字祕密心真言一卷梵漢兩字祕密心中心真言一卷梵漢兩字普賢行願讚一卷梵漢兩字大佛頂根本讚一卷梵漢兩字大佛頂結讚一卷梵漢兩字大隨求結讚一卷梵漢兩字天龍八部讚一卷梵漢兩字百字讚一卷梵漢兩字送本尊歸本土讚一卷梵漢兩字彌勒菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字慈氏菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字觀自在菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字虛空藏菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字金剛藏菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字文殊室利菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字普賢菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字除蓋障菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字地藏菩薩讚一卷梵漢兩字滿願讚一卷梵漢兩字毘盧舍那佛神變加持結吉慶伽陀讚一卷梵漢兩字釋迦如來涅槃後彌勒菩薩悲願讚一卷梵漢兩字金剛經論頌一卷梵漢兩字法華二十八品題目兼諸羅漢名一卷已上三十六部三十七卷同帙。

translation: Jingming jing ji wulong yiji wen kong shu) jingming ji jie guanzhong shou shou (Zisheng si dao liang ji) jingming jing guanzhong shou shi wei wulong (Zhongjieshan shaman qizhen shu) has the above two parts in six volumes of the same book.

source_sentence: 法華經銷文略疏三卷一帙(天長寺釋延秀集解)肇論略疏一卷(東山矩作)肇論抄三卷(牛頭山幽西寺慧證撰)肇論文句圖一卷(慧證撰)肇論略出要義兼注附焉并序一卷(沙門靈興撰)已上四部六卷同帙。
translation: Fahua jing xiaowen lue shou three volumes in one (Tianchang si Shi Yanxiu ji jie), zhao lun lue shou one volume (Dongshan ku zuo), zhao lun cao three volumes (Niutou shan youxi si huizheng shou), zhao lun wenju tu one volume (huizheng shou), zhao lun lue out yaoi jie with notes and preface one volume (shaman lingxing shou), and the above four sections of six volumes are in the same book.

translation: The above four sections are in four volumes.

translation: The Wise One Great Master's Method for the Cultivation of Samādhi and Constant Practice in One Volume

translation: Kanshin yusin koujutsu ji (Zhizhe) in one volume

source_sentence: 四十二字開義一卷(南岳思大□作)釋門自鏡錄五卷(僧慧詳集)觀心十二部經義一卷(天台頂述)天台智者大師所著經論章疏科目一卷形神不滅論一卷(靈溪沙門海雲撰)法華三昧修證訣一卷已上九部一十三卷同帙。
translation: Forty-two Syllables: An Introduction (Nanyue Sidaizhu), Five Fascicle Record of the Śrīmānas (Senghui shōshū), Twelve Part Avalokitêśvara: An Introduction (Tiantai ding shū), One Fascicle of the Discourses and Commentaries of the Great Master Tiantai Zhizhe, One Fascicle of the Treatise on the Immortality of Form (Lingxi shamen haiyun shū), One Fascicle of the Secrets on the Cultivation of the Lotus Absorption, and thirteen Fascicles from the above nine Divisions in the same volume.

source_sentence: 鳩摩羅法師隨順修多羅四悉檀義不負墮門一卷大般若經關兼二十九位法門一卷量處輕重儀一卷(道宣緝集)羯磨文一卷略羯磨一卷(西大原寺懷素撰)說罪要行法一卷(義淨三藏撰)諸天地獄壽量分限一卷(終南山宗叡撰)受菩薩戒文一卷最上乘佛性歌一卷(沙門真覺述)大乘楞伽正宗一卷隋廬山遺愛寺慧珍念佛三昧指歸一卷梵語雜名一卷四條式并大小乘戒訣一卷已上一十三部一十三卷同帙。
translation: Kumāra Fashi shun shudra sifu shidan yi not shabby fallen gate one volume (Da banruo jing guan cum twenty-nine stages of the Dharma gate one volume (Daoxuan qici ji) karma text one volume omitted karma one volume (Xidai dabuan si huaisu zu) shuo sin yaoxing fa one volume (Yijing sanzang zu) zhoutiantian dengxiang fenjieyi one volume (Zhongnan shan zongrui zu) shoushou shoushou xingshi song one volume (Shaman Zhenjue shu) dasheng lengjia zhengzong one volume (Sui lushan yiai si huizhen nianfo sanmei zhigui one volume (Sanskrit miscellaneous names one volume, four bar formulas and large and small vehicle precepts secrets one volume (Shang yezhang bujian xiqie shou) in the same volume.

source_sentence: 南岳思禪師法門傳二卷(衛尉丞杜朏撰)天台大師答陳宜帝書一卷天台略錄一卷智者琢松讚一卷(頂禪□述)天台智者大師十二所道場記一卷(汀述)法華靈驗傳一卷感通傳一卷清涼山略傳一卷已上八部一十卷同帙。
translation: Nangyue si chanshi famen zhuan yifang (Written by Du Yue, the prime minister of Weiwei) tiantai dashi ai dashi chan yidi shouyi yifang tiantai lue lu yiqie zan yiqie zhuan zhijian (Top Chan) tiantai zhijie dashi xiaoshao daochang ji yifang (Ting's account) fahua lingyan zhuan yifang gantong zhuan yifang qingliang shan luezhuan yiqie has the preceding eight parts and ten volumes in the same book.

source_sentence: 大唐部州雙峯山曹溪寶林傳十卷一帙(會稽沙門靈徹字明泳序)上都清禪師至演禪師鍾傳一卷(大理牛肅與僧至演同敘)南荊沙門無行在天竺國致於唐國一卷內供奉談筵法師歎齊格并文一卷集新舊齊文五卷上都雲華寺泳字大觀法師奉答皇太子所問諸經了義竝牋一卷歎道俗德文三卷已上八部一十二卷同帙。
translation: A ten-fascicle biography of Coxi Bolin of Shuangfong Shan in the province of Daitang (preface by the Huichi ascetic Lingchi, Mingyong), a one-volume biography of Seongdu Seongji to Zennyeon, a one-volume biography (narrated by Niu Su of Dali and Seng Zhiyan), a one-volume biography of the Nangjing ascetic Wuxing who went to Tang in the country of Tianzhu, and a one-volume collection of new and old Qiwen by the Fontainebleau Dharma teacher who praised the Qi ge and Wen, a one-volume collection of five new and old Qiwen volumes, a one-volume collection of sūtras and śramaṇas asked by the crown prince, and a three-volume collection of scriptures praising the virtues of the laity.

source_sentence: 揚州東大雲寺演和上碑并序一卷(李邕撰)唐故大廣禪師大和上楞伽岑塔碑并序一卷(陸亘撰)唐故大律師釋道圓山龔碑并序一卷(李邕撰)大唐大慈恩寺翻經大德基法師墓誌銘并序一卷大慈恩寺大法師基公塔銘并序一卷唐故終南山靈感寺大律師道宣行記一卷大唐西明寺故大德道宣律師讚一卷天台大師答陳宣帝書一卷已上九部九卷同帙。
translation: Yangzhou East Dayun Temple Yanhe Shang Bie and Preface One Volume (written by Li Yong) Tang's Former Daguan Chan Master Daxiang Laengjia Cen Ta Bie and Preface One Volume (written by Lu Gan) Tang's Former Daluishi Shi Dao Yuanshan Gong Bie and Preface One Volume (written by Li Yong) Datang Dacien Temple Translation Scripture Dade Ji Fashi Mingshi and Preface One Volume Datacien Temple Dafashi Ji Gong Ta Mingshi and Preface One Volume Tang's Former Zhongnan Mountain Lingan Temple Daluishi Daoxuan Xingji One Volume Datang Ximing Temple's Former Dade Daoxuan Lushi Zan One Volume Tiantai Dashi's Reply to Emperor Chen Xuan One Volume has the preceding nine divisions and nine volumes in the same book.

source_sentence: 大唐新修定公卿士庶內族吉凶書儀一卷(鄭餘慶重修定)開元詩格一卷(徐隱秦字肅然撰)祇對義一卷判一百條一卷(駱賓王撰)祝元膺詩集一卷杭越寄和詩集并序一卷詩集五卷法華二十八品七言詩集一卷已上一十二部四十一卷同帙。
translation: Da Tang Xinxiu ding gongqing shizhu jixiang shuyi yiqieyi yiqieyi fang (Zheng Yixing re xiu ding) Kaiyuan shi ge yiqieyi fang (Xu Yinqin zizi suiran zhuan) jian yiqieyi jueyi jueyi jieyi fang (Luo Binwang zhuan) Zhu Yuanying shiji jieyi fang yue sent and poetry collection and preface yiqieyi fangjian shiji jieyi fangjian jieyi has the above twelve parts and forty-one volumes in the same book.

source_sentence: 大毘盧遮那大悲胎藏大曼荼羅一鋪(五幅白畫)金剛界大曼荼羅一鋪(七帙)供養賢聖等七種壇樣一卷十七壇樣一卷金剛界三十七尊種子曼荼羅樣一張金剛界八十一尊種子曼荼羅樣一張法華曼荼羅樣一張胎藏曼荼羅手印樣一卷南岳思大師示先生骨影一鋪(三幅)阿蘭若比丘見空中普賢影一張法慧和尚閻王前誦法華影一張山登禪師誦法華感金銀殿影一卷慧斌禪師誦法華神人來拜影一張映禪師誦法華善神來聽經影一張定禪師誦法華天童給事影一張慧向禪師誦法華滅後墓上生蓮華及墓裏常誦有經聲影一卷秦郡老僧教弟子感夢示宿因影一張道超禪師誦法華感二世弟子生處影一張法慧禪師誦法華口放光照室宇影一張大聖僧伽和尚影一卷舍利五粒(三菩薩舍利盛瑠璃小瓶子二支佛舍利盛白蠟小合子)竝納白石壺子右件法門等。
translation: 大毘盧遮那大悲胎藏大曼荼羅一鋪(五幅白畫)金剛界大曼荼羅一鋪(七帙)供養賢聖等七種壇樣一卷十七壇樣一卷金剛界三十七尊種子曼荼羅樣一張金剛界八十一尊種子曼荼羅樣一張法華曼荼羅樣一張胎藏曼荼羅手印樣一卷南岳思大師示先生骨影一鋪(三幅)阿蘭若比丘見空中普賢影一張法慧和尚閻王前誦法華影一張山登禪師誦法華感金銀殿影一卷慧斌禪師誦法華神人來拜影一張映禪師誦法華善神來聽經影一張定禪師誦法華天童給事影一張慧向禪師誦法華滅後墓上生蓮華及墓裏常誦有經聲影一卷秦郡老僧教弟子感夢示宿因影一張道超禪師誦法華感二世弟子生處影一張法慧禪師誦法華口放光照室宇影一張大聖僧伽和尚影一卷舍利五粒(三菩薩舍利盛瑠璃小瓶子二支佛舍利盛白蠟小合子)竝納白石壺子右件法門等。

source_sentence: 圓仁。
translation: Yuanren.

source_sentence: 去承和五年八月到大唐揚州大都督府。
translation: In the eighth month of the fifth year of Chenghe's reign, he went to the capital of Yangzhou in the Tang Dynasty.

source_sentence: 巡歷城內諸寺。
translation: He toured the temples in the city.

source_sentence: 寫取如前。
translation: He wrote them down as before.

source_sentence: 爰終南山宗叡和尚學邁先達。
translation: "The monk Zongrui of Zhongnanshan was a pioneer in learning.

source_sentence: 悟究幽致。
translation: He had the profundity of enlightenment and investigation.

source_sentence: 能解梵漢。
translation: He was able to understand the Sanskrit and Han languages.

source_sentence: 妙閑悉曇之音。
translation: He was able to understand the sounds of the Brahmā and Han, and the sounds of the wonderful leisurely siddhaṃ.

source_sentence: 為向西天辭舊到。
translation: He resigned from his former position in order to go to the Western Heaven.

source_sentence: 圓仁幸得偶謁。
translation: It was Yuanren's good fortune to meet him by chance.

source_sentence: 受學梵天悉曇。
translation: He was trained in the Siddhaṃ of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 兼習梵漢之語。
translation: He also studied the speech of Brahmā and Han.

source_sentence: 又逢大唐內供奉辯弘阿闍梨付法弟子全雅阿闍梨。
translation: He also met Quanya Ajari, a disciple of Bianhong Ajari who had been entrusted with the teaching by the inner consecrator of the Great Tang.

source_sentence: 諮稟祕法。
translation: He consulted with him about the esoteric teachings.

source_sentence: 和尚感乎遠誠。
translation: The monk was impressed with his far-reaching sincerity.

source_sentence: 付以祕要。
translation: He gave him the secret essentials.

source_sentence: 遂乃囑授念誦法門。
translation: He then instructed him to teach the method of recitation.

source_sentence: 并胎藏金剛兩部曼荼羅諸壇樣等。
translation: He also gave him the patterns for the maṇḍalas of both the garbhadhātu and vajradhātu.

source_sentence: 其後擬問天台。
translation: Later, he wanted to ask about Tiantai.

source_sentence: 為行路遼遠往還失時。
translation: It was because he had traveled a long way and was out of time when he returned.

source_sentence: 有勅不許發赴。
translation: I was told not to allow him to go there.

source_sentence: 慨悵難及。
translation: I was sorry, but it was difficult to get there.

source_sentence: 所求法門雖未備足。
translation: Although the teaching I was seeking was not yet complete.

source_sentence: 且錄卷帙勘定如件。
translation: I'll just record the dossier and check it out as a document.

source_sentence: 大唐開成四年歲次己未四月二十日。
translation: "On the twentieth day of the fourth month of the year before the fourth year of the Tang emperor's reign, the Tendai school asked the transmission of the lantern teaching.

source_sentence: 天台宗請益傳燈法師位圓仁錄。
translation: Record of the Tendai School's Inquiry into the Transmission of the Lamp Dharma Master Bit Yuanren.
